theorem.name: add_succ

text.english: The following holds\[ \forall (a\; b : \mathbb N) , a + succ(b) = succ(a + b) \]
text.italiano: Vale il seguente\[ \forall (a\; b : \mathbb N) , a + succ(b) = succ(a + b) \]

theorem.coq:
Theorem add_succ : forall a b : nat, (a + succ b) = succ(a + b).
Proof.
Admitted.
